p: We conducted a qualitative sociological study combining observations and in-depth individual interviews conducted between April and September 2014, primarily in Yaoundé. This study was part of the ANRS 12288-EVOLCAM cross-sectional mixed methods survey which aimed to study current challenges faced by Cameroon’s national antiretroviral treatment programme in the care and treatment of major HIV co-infections, namely viral hepatitis and tuberculosis. 18
